thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Pearse Lyons Used Brewing Expertise to Create Maker of Animal-Health Products

author: James R. Hagerty
title: Pearse Lyons Used Brewing Expertise to Create Maker of Animal-Health Products
text:
His mother wanted him to study medicine but Pearse Lyons thought that would take too long. After receiving a biochemistry degree in his native Ireland, he earned a doctorate in brewing science at the University of Birmingham in England. His expertise in yeast launched a career as an executive for brewers and distillers.
In his 30s, Dr. Lyons resettled in Kentucky and decided to aim much higher. With $10,000 of savings, he launched his own firm, Alltech Inc., based in Nicholasville, Ky. With annual sales of nearly $3 billion... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
